forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Thunderstorms possible...mainly in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with scattered thunderstorms arriving for the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 47F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 13C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 54F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain. High 13C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain. High near 55F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low near 45F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 13C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 13C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: More clouds than sun. High near 55F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial clearing expected late. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 17C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 62F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 6C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 43F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High around 20C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 69F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 17C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 62F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 62F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 58F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 9C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 47F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
